text: Post Reels between 6–9 PM for higher reach.
Use 3–5 relevant hashtags. Too many reduce reach.
Hook viewers in the first 3 seconds or they scroll.
Reply to comments in the first hour to boost engagement.
Use trending audio at low volume for algorithm boost.
Keep Reels under 10 seconds for higher completion rate.
Add on-screen text so silent viewers stay longer.
Post consistently. 3–5 Reels per week works best.
Pin your best Reel to your profile for new visitors.
End every Reel with a call-to-action like Follow or Save.
